mapper.select: select gr.organization_id from sys_organization_role gr left join sys_organization g on g.id = gr.organization_id where gr.role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and g.del_flag != 1
select role_id from sys_organization_role where organization_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_organization_role (id, organization_id, role_id, create_by, create_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into sys_organization_role (id, organization_id, role_id,create_by, create_date) VALUES
(#{groupRole.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{groupRole.groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{groupRole.roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{groupRole.createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{groupRole.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

id,
organization_id,

mapper.update:
update sys_organization_role
organization_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_organization_role set organization_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
